notes:
This pack is decently stacked, but the [Day's Undoing] is the money pick at about $10.

The "real" pick is [Anointer of Champions] over [Wild Instincts] and [Blessed Spirits]. Anointer is great in the early game making all your early drops very difficult to block. It is unfortunately a miserable draw late in the game when you don;t have good attacks, but it's high end in the early game really carries it.
